New Records: Mitchell Duke scored his twelfth goal for the Socceroos
Gethin Jones became Socceroo #639 on his debut
Key Match Events: Amine Binaddi scored an own goal in the 35th minute
Mitchell Duke scored a close-range header in the 60th minute
Bahrain fought back with an attack down the left side in the 68th minute
Joe Gauci made a fantastic save in the 68th minute
Gethin Jones was replaced by Nathaniel Atkinson in the 78th minute
Marco Tilio entered the fray at the same time to replace Sam Silvera in the 78th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Graham Arnold emphasized the importance of maintaining standards to achieve a shared goal
Gethin Jones was hoping to bring leadership qualities to the Socceroos squad
Sam Silvera felt 'privileged' to represent the Socceroos in the Asian Cup
Mathew Ryan believed his Asian Cup experience could help the squad in Qatar
Post-Match Reflections: Graham Arnold lauded the Socceroos' performance, calling it 'the perfect preparation for the Asian Cup'
Craig Goodwin praised the Socceroos' patience in the win
Mitchell Duke was pleased with the 'important' minutes he gained ahead of the Asian Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Baniyas Stadium in Abu Dhabi
The Socceroos will face India in their first group game at the Asian Cup
The Subway Socceroos unveiled a new brand campaign ahead of the Asian Cup
